long_description: A glamorous bold frame with broad temples, the women's Smith Shorewood Sunglasses are sure to make waves, whether basking at the beach or strolling Broadway. Brown gradient lenses fade gradually from top to bottom and provide 100% protection from harmful UVA/B/C rays. Carbonic TLT lenses are highly impact-resistant and deliver superb optic clarity. Hydrophilic Megol nose pads grip the face gently; grip actually improves when wet. 53% bio-based Evolve frames are made with Rilsan(R) Clear, a light, durable, non-petroleum-based material derived from renewable, non-GMO castor plants. Smith Shorewood Sunglasses for women provide a medium fit and large base 8 lens coverage.
short_description: A glamorous bold frame with broad temples, the women's Smith Shorewood Sunglasses are sure to make waves, whether basking at the beach or strolling Broadway.
